item.description: Joanne Froggatt and Ioan Gruffudd are joined by Katherine Kelly in this final series of the ITV thriller Meet the cast of Liar series 2 You’ll see some familiar faces in the second series of ITV’s hit crime thriller Liar, which picks up where the finale left off.
